intro: Rhanterium intermedium, commonly known as the intermediate rhanterium, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and compound umbellate inflorescences. The plant produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are pinnately divided, with a delicate, feathery appearance. Rhanterium intermedium is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks.
